Posts.EditableText:
A while back I stumbled on a way to  ["Mark down" html/css formatting inside a Squiffy link](https://textadventures.co.uk/forum/squiffy/topic/wxi-0pdouk6ugrgyedqktg/dynamically-change-link-colors).

You can do the same thing with images! 

```
@set small = width="100" height="100"

![{small}](https://live.staticflickr.com/1580/24896523165_4ec5c8f49d_b.jpg)
```
I got the above image with "Creative Commons licenses" required in my search, and also double checked the [permissions](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/2.0/) granted by the artist.
